methods.description: Get the thumb of a slice

queryparameters.name: fif
queryparameters.description: The absolute path of the image

queryparameters.name: mimeType
queryparameters.description: The mime type of the image

queryparameters.name: topLeftX
queryparameters.description: The top left X value of the requested ROI

queryparameters.name: topLeftY
queryparameters.description: The top left Y value of the requested ROI

queryparameters.name: width
queryparameters.description: The width of the ROI (in pixels)

queryparameters.name: height
queryparameters.description: The height of the ROI (in pixels)

queryparameters.name: imageWidth
queryparameters.description: The image width of the whole image

queryparameters.name: imageHeight
queryparameters.description: The image height of the whole image

queryparameters.name: maxSize
queryparameters.description: The max width or height of the generated thumb

queryparameters.name: zoom
queryparameters.description: The zoom used in order to extract the ROI (0 = higher resolution). Ignored if maxSize is used.

queryparameters.name: location
queryparameters.description: A geometry in WKT Format (Well-known text)

queryparameters.name: draw
queryparameters.description: If used, draw the geometry contour on the crop. draw takes precedence over mask & alphamask.

queryparameters.name: mask
queryparameters.description: If used, return the mask of the geometry (black & white) instead of the crop. mask takes precedence over alphamask

queryparameters.name: thickness
queryparameters.description: If draw used, set the thickness of the geometry contour on the crop.

queryparameters.name: color
queryparameters.description: If draw used, set the color of the geometry contour on the crop.

queryparameters.name: square
queryparameters.description: If used, try to extends the ROI around the crop to have a square.

queryparameters.name: alphaMask
queryparameters.description: If used, return the crop with the mask in the alphachannel (0% to 100%). PNG required

queryparameters.name: drawScaleBar
queryparameters.description: If true, draw a scale bar

queryparameters.name: resolution
queryparameters.description: Resolution to print in scale bar if used

queryparameters.name: magnification
queryparameters.description: Magnification to print in scale bar if used

queryparameters.name: safe
queryparameters.description: If true, skip too large ROI (true by default)

queryparameters.name: colormap
queryparameters.description: The absolute path of a colormap file (see IIP format)

queryparameters.name: inverse
queryparameters.description: True if colors have to be inversed (see IIP format)

queryparameters.name: contrast
queryparameters.description: Multiply pixels by contrast (see IIP format)

queryparameters.name: gamma
queryparameters.description: Apply gamma correction (see IIP format)

queryparameters.name: bits
queryparameters.description: Output bit depth per channel (see IIP format)
